name: Primitiv
description:
Play as one person with many parts or as an individual part to solve puzzles.

Before playing please turn down your computer's volume settings (just a bit), thank you

The developers:

  • Art :  Lingster777#2824 (Discord) + anchorlight#2891 (Discord)
  • Game Design : Everyone
  • Level Design and Puzzle Design : Commander_Johan#4727 (Discord)
  • Programming and Integration : https://twitter.com/Clammiee + anchorlight#2891 (Discord)
  • Music : anchorlight#2891 (Discord)

Made in Unity
